column2: "Dɛm ntsi ɔwo
column3: me ba
column4: hyɛ dzen wɔ adom a ɔwɔ Kraest Jesus mu no mu."

column2: "Na dza etsee no m’anomu wɔ adasefo pii enyim no
column3: ɔnoara na fa hyɛ nyimpa anokwafo a wobotum akyerɛkyerɛ binom so nsa."

column2: "Na ɔwo so sɔw akotorka no bi dɛ Kraest Jesus sordaanyi pa."
"Ɔsordaanyi a ɔwɔ som mu biara mmfa daa daa asetsena mu nsɛm mbrabra noho
column3: ama ɔaasɔ nyia ɔfaa no yɛɛ sordaanyi no enyi."

column2: "Na sɛ obi si akan wɔ agodzi bi mu a
column3: wɔmmbɔ no konyim abɔtsir
column4: gyedɛ odzi esi dɛ mbrɛ no ho mbra tse."

column2: "Okuafo a ɔyɛ edwuma no
column3: nna otwar dɛ odzi abakan no bi."

column2: "Dwen dza mereka yi ho; na Ewuradze bɛma wo adze nyina mu ntseasee."
"Kaa Jesus Kraest a ɔasoɛr efi ewufo mu no
column3: ofi David asefo mu
column4: dɛ mbrɛ me nsɛmpa tse no
column6: "no mu na mosɔw akotorka dze besi mpokyerɛ mu
column7: dɛ ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi; na Nyankopɔn asɛm dze

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na mosɔw yinom nyina wɔ hɔn a wɔasan mu eyi hɔn no ntsi
column3: ma hɔn so woeenya nkwagye no a ɔwɔ Kraest mu no

column2: "Nokwasɛm nye yi: Sɛ yɛnye no wui a
column3: yɛnye no bɛtsena ase so:"

column2: "sɛ yetsintsim a
column3: yɛnye no bedzi hen; sɛ yɛpa no a

column2: "sɛ hɛn
column3: yɛnnyɛ anokwafo a
column5: ɔyɛ nokwafo; osiandɛ onntum mmpa noho ekyir."

column2: "Iyinom ho na kaa hɔn
column3: na kasa kyerɛ hɔn Nyankopɔn enyim
column4: dɛ mma wɔnngye nsɛm mu ekyingyehun a mfaso biara nnyi ho a ɔsɛɛ etsiefo adwen."

column2: "Bɔ mbɔdzen yi woho kyerɛ dɛ nyia Nyankopɔn apen no
column3: odwumayɛnyi a onnyi dɛ ɔfɛr
column4: na ɔpeepee nokwasɛm no mu yie."

column2: "Na nsɛnhun dze
column3: yi woho fi ho: na wɔbɔkɔ enyim ara wɔ mbusubɔ mu
column5: "na hɔn kasaa bɛtserɛw dɛ kuprɔwee: hɔn mu bi nye Himeneus nye Filetus;"

column2: "nkorɔfo a wɔayew efi nokwar no ho ka dɛ wusoɛr no etwa mu dada
column3: na woebutuw binom hɔn gyedzi."

column2: "Naaso Nyankopɔn fapem tsim hɔ pintsinn kitsa nsɔwano yi
column3: Ewuradze nyim hɔn a wɔyɛ nedze: na ma obiara a ɔbɔ Ewuradze dzin ntwe noho mfi dza ɔnntsen ho."

column2: "Na ofi kɛse mu nnyi sika nye dwetɛ ndzɛmba nko
column3: na ndua nye dɛtse so; na wobu bi bi

column2: "Na sɛ obi tsew noho fi iyinom ho a
column3: ɔbɛyɛ adze a wobu no bi
column5: owura dze yɛ biribi a ɔyɛ yie
column6: na woesiesie dze ama edwuma pa biara."

column2: "Guan fi mbabunber mu akɔndɔ ho
column3: na nye hɔn a wofi akoma a no mu tsew mu frɛ Ewuradze ndzi tsenenee

column2: "Na mbatam hɔn nkwasea ekyingye dze
column3: pow
column4: osiandɛ inyim dɛ ɔdze ntokwaa ba."

column2: "Na ɔnnsɛ Ewuradze akowaa dɛ ɔyɛ ntokwapɛfo
column3: na mbom ɔsɛ no dɛ ɔdwe ma nyimpa nyina
column7: "ɔkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn a wɔnye hɔnho dzi esi wɔ ɔdwe mu; dɛ bi a Nyankopɔn bɛma hɔn nnuho akɔ nokwar no ho nyimdzee mu
column9: "na hɔn enyi do aatsew hɔn efi abɔnsam a ɔafa hɔn ndɔmmum no efir mu ama Nyankopɔn apɛdze."
